title: Gold tiara

properties.name: description
properties.value: A gold tiara is an item that members can create at a furnace from a gold bar along with a tiara mould and level 42 Crafting, granting 35 Crafting experience. They are a purely cosmetic head slot item, though they can be turned into an elemental or catalytic tiara, by bringing a gold tiara and either talisman to the appropriate runic altar. The talisman itself is lost in the process.

Item ID26788

A gold tiara is an item that members can create at a furnace from a gold bar along with a tiara mould and level 42 Crafting, granting 35 Crafting experience. They are a purely cosmetic head slot item, though they can be turned into an elemental or catalytic tiara, by bringing a gold tiara and either talisman to the appropriate runic altar. The talisman itself is lost in the process.

Note: Beware of scammers trying to trade large numbers of these at the Grand Exchange for inflated prices

[[File:Gold tiara detail.png|left|130px]]
[[File:Gold tiara chathead.png|left]]
A '''gold tiara''' is an item that members can create at a [[furnace]] from a [[gold bar]] along with a [[tiara mould]] and level 42 [[Crafting]], granting 35 Crafting experience. They are a purely cosmetic head slot item, though they can be turned into an [[Elemental tiara|elemental]] or [[catalytic tiara]], by bringing a gold tiara and either talisman to the appropriate runic altar. The talisman itself is lost in the process.

'''Note:''' Beware of scammers trying to trade large numbers of these at the Grand Exchange for inflated prices
